subject: Basketball (College)
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The University of Dayton Arena has hosted 107 N.C.A.A. tournament games, more than any other site, and because of this, the city often boasts it is the “epicenter of basketball.”
snippet: The University of Dayton Arena has hosted 107 N.C.A.A. tournament games, more than any other site, and because of this, the city often boasts it is the “epicenter of basketball.”
